name: Track-A-Mole
description:
You play as a pro arcade gamer that wants to set themselves a challenge. You decide that playing two "Whack-A-Mole" machines at the same time would make it a challenge.  

Make fast-paced switches between machines and keep your hands on the keyboard as you keep your hands on the keyboard, and your eyes on the moles. Having four different difficulties, lets see how far you can go!

Made with Unity, by GiantMarble.
